mapper.sql: select t.tutor_id, t.name as tutor_name, email, c.course_id, c.name, description,start_date,end_date ,a.addr_id,street,city,state,zip,country from tutors t left outer join addresses a on t.addr_id=a.addr_id left outer join courses c on t.tutor_id = c.tutor_id
mapper.select: select t.tutor_id, t.name as tutor_name, email, c.course_id, c.name, description,start_date,end_date ,a.addr_id,street,city,state,zip,country from tutors t left outer join addresses a on t.addr_id=a.addr_id left outer join courses c on t.tutor_id = c.tutor_id where t.tutor_id = #{tutorId}
